name: Pitchfork Trauma
description:
You wake up in the middle of a dark forest and you don’t know what happened, who you are and how you got there. You feel a sense of urgency to move, because someone or something is lurking in the shadows. The complete amnesia starts to dissolve as you find more and more clues along the way which help you remember your past. As you piece the puzzle together you realize: You are not Alone! 

Created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - movement 
  • Mouse - aim, movement direction
  • Mouse Scroll - weapon swap (only with Nox)
  • Left Mouse Button - shoot
  • Tab - switch characters (only on Ma(d)nes(s) level)

Created by:

Fork on the Table Collective - Weroosh, Onsightfree, Ahus, jykazzzz
